Key Match Events: India won by 8 wickets (with 46 balls remaining)
Pre-Game Insights: India have won all seven completed T20Is against Ireland so far
Discipline more than strength seems to be the necessary ingredient to win at this T20 World Cup
Ireland's middle order of Harry Tector and Curtis Campher will have to work together to deny Kuldeep Yadav wickets
Post-Match Reflections: Rishabh Pant's comeback for India was huge after a car accident less than two years ago
Harry Tector made his highest T20I score against India, an action-packed 64 off 33 balls
Miscellaneous Highlights: The surfaces at this tournament are proving trickier than expected
Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli and Suryakumar Yadav - their three best batters - are likely to be Nos. 1, 3
India's bowling contains plenty of variety but it is centered around Bumrah and Kuldeep
